page.title: 20THE MOUNTAIN OVER CADOXTON-2
page.content:
Gelli-march is owned by Mr. C. Tanner and is a much bigger farm, covering 200 acres of land and both {sheep and beef cattle}are kept. Mr.Tanner buys and sells his animals at Carmarthen and Cowbridge as well as Neath markets. The sides of the mountain immediately behind our school are very steep. It is sometimes known as {Y Graig}which means{"the Rock".}Today, it is mostly{forested}but in the past {coal}was mined there and the remains of an{old tramroad}can still be seen. This tramroad carried coal down to the {Tennant Canal at Cadoxton. } ***** Tonna Prim. Llangatwg Comp. ___________ _______________ COLLATOR:Mr.P.Martell Mr.B.L.Davies.
